Reviews.Title: good basic phone
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my dad, who needed something basic with no frills. He doesn't really like that the screen is so small but that's a comment on his eyesight not the phone. It works fine, his only complaint is that he can't see on screen when a voicemail was left. But that's something that you can find out when listening to voicemails anyway.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Brent A. Walter "waltassault"
Reviews.Content: Works great and battery life is good.  I just wanted a basic phone that could do some internet data functions.  This does it.  Probably not for a big tech type person but good for a person who just needs a phone.

Reviews.Title: was just what I was looking for in a phone
Reviews.Author: kit
Reviews.Content: Have had this phone for over a month now and have been very happy with this phone so far.  Didn't want a fancy 'smart' phone.  Like all the features this phone has and the battery life seems to be good.  I like how the camera feature works, it also has a video that I haven't tried yet.  Also received the phone really quickly, before the estimated arrival date!!  Will probably be ordering another one for my Husband.

Reviews.Title: Battery dies after a day of use - The Screen Display messed up after two weeks of use
Reviews.Author: Joel L Steinberg
Reviews.Content: The reason that i'm not giving this phone one star is that when it did work it worked just as I needed.  Additionally, I'd like to believe I got a faulty phone and the rest work fine.  Not sure if i'll get the same phone again though.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Gregary
Reviews.Content: Phone is great but can't download songs from computer to phone,phone manual lacks on instruction on how to download files from other sources.

Reviews.Title: Phone not great
Reviews.Author: Angela Bangs
Reviews.Content: Phone looked bigger than it actually is. Not liking the  product too tiny, would rather return the phone soon today isn't soon enough

ProductInfo.Name: ZTE AT&T Z221 Unlocked GSM Flip Phone with 2" Display + External Display Screen, Camera, Bluetooth and Social Networking - Black
